page.title: 06 POLICE IN EYNSHAM
page.content:
The local Eynsham policeman is called COLIN RICHARDS.He has been the Eynsham policeman for 6 years.If you are a man and you want to be a policeman you have to be 5,9 ft,but if you are a women then you have to be 5,4 ft.They have not been many breakins or things like that for the past two months. Bartholomew school has been broken into 3 times this year,and a couple of other schools have also been broken into. you have 5 cse's to be a police man or woman.So altogether there aren't many crimes in the village of Eynsham.
BY Angie pearson and debbie Poole
